view.intro-text: FR You have indicated that you have access to the following governmental benefits.
view.provincial-or-territorial-dental-benefit: FR Provincial or Territorial dental benefit:
view.update-your-access-text: FR Update your access to governmental benefits.
view.no-government-benefits: FR You have indicated you do not have access to any government benefits

info-updated.alert-heading: FR You have successfully applied for the Canadian Dental Care Plan!
info-updated.your-info-has-been-updated: FR Your information has been updated.

index.intro-text: FR If you have access to governmental benefits, keep that information up to your date on your application.
index.body-text: FR This information will be used to help coordinate payment with Sun Life
index.update-your-access-text: FR Update your access to governmental benefits.

edit.page-title: FR Access to other federal, provincial or territorial dental benefits
edit.access-to-dental: FR Access to dental coverage through a provincial, territorial or federal government social program will not impact your eligibility for the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
edit.eligibility-criteria: FR If you meet all the eligibility criteria, your coverage will be coordinated between the plans to ensure there are no gaps or duplication in coverage.
edit.required-label: FR Complete all fields unless marked as optional

federal-benefits.title: FR Federal benefits
federal-benefits.legend: FR Do you have dental benefits through a social program offered by a federal program?
federal-benefits.option-no: FR No, I do not have federal benefits

social-programs.legend: FR Please select which social program you are covered under. If you have more than one, please select the one you use most.

provincial-territorial-benefits.title: FR Provincial or territorial benefits
provincial-territorial-benefits.legend: FR Do you have dental benefits through a social program offered by your province or territory?
provincial-territorial-benefits.option-yes: FR Yes, I have provincial or territorial benefits
provincial-territorial-benefits.option-no: FR No, I do not have provincial or territorial benefits

social-programs.input-legend: FR If yes, through which province or territory?
social-programs.radio-legend: FR Please select which social program you are covered under. If you have more than one, please select the one you use most.

error-message.federal-benefit-required: FR Select whether you have federal dental benefits
error-message.provincial-benefit-required: FR Select whether you have provincial or territorial dental benefits
error-message.provincial-territorial-required: FR Select a province or territory
